inclusion.criterion: stage III, IV or relapsed breast cancer confirmed by histology and biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 2 weeks at least since last chemotherapy or radiotherapy and 2 weeks at least since last systemic steroid hormone and other immunosuppressive therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Side effects of chemotherapy have subsided
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The target antigens GD2, CD44v6, or Her2 is expressed in malignancy tissues by immuno-histochemical or flow cytometry
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) PS of 0 or 1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Initial hematopoietic reconstitution with neutrophils (ANC) ≥ 1×10^6/L; platelet (PLT) ≥ 1×10^8/L
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Proper renal and hepatic functions (ULN denotes "upper limit of normal range") with serum creatinine ≤ 2×ULN; serum bilirubin ≤ 3×ULN; AST/ALT ≤ 2.5×ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Written, informed consent obtained prior to any study-specific procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of epilepsy or other central nervous system diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who require systemic corticosteroid or other immunosuppressive therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of prolonged or serious heart disease during QT
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or recent treatment (within the 28-day period prior to Day 0) with another investigational drug or previous participation in this study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inadequate liver and renal function with serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dl; serum (total) bilirubin > 2.0 mg/dl; AST & ALT > 3 x ULN
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with stage III breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. She has no palpable masses on breast exam and the surgical margins were clear after lumpectomy.
